author: Moobeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: Patch 7.2 Server Maintenance Announced
text:
Good news everyone! Server maintenance for our next patch,  Patch  7.2 , has been scheduled!

On  January 25th  at 3:00 am PT for  NA ,   5:00 UK time for  EUW , and 3:00 CET for  EUNE , servers will go down for maintenance and the  7.2  patch will be applied!

Here's   NA version  of the   Network Operations  maintenance announcement:
"On 01/25/17, starting at, 01:30 Pacific Time (09:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 7.2. At 03:00 Pacific time (11:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours." Be sure to check your particular servers status page for your region's specific  7.2   maintenance times:

[ NA ,  EUW ,  EUNE ,  BR ,  TR ,  LAS ,  LAN ,  RU ,  OCE ] 
Until the official patch notes are available, check the    [ 7.2 PBE content ]   for a tentative look at what is coming in the patch - including Warwick's update, new Sewn Chaos skins, content for future and more!
